1.text: Pour 1 1/2 cups of water into a large bowl.

2.text: Pour 3 cups of corn starch into the water.

3.text: Consider adding color, scent, or glitter to the sand.

6.text: Pour the flour into a large bowl.

7.text: Add any powder-based colors, scents, or glitter to the flour.

8.text: Add any oil-based scents and colors to the baby oil and stir well.

9.text: Add the baby oil to the flour.

10.text: Mix it up and play with it.

12.text: Pour 4 cups of corn starch into a large bowl.

13.text: Mix in any glitter, scents, or powdered colors to the corn starch, if desired.

14.text: Mix in any oil-based dyes or essential oils to the vegetable oil, if desired.

15.text: Mix the vegetable oil into the corn starch to keep it looking like snow.

16.text: Mix it up well and start play time.

17.text: Keep it in an air-tight container.
